channel.title: NuclearBurrito, orangeandblack5 and Queen Alfa Appreciation Thread
channel.description:
# :balloon: So, today is @NuclearBurrito 's Birthday! And tommorow is the birthday of @orangeandblack5 and @Queen_Alfa ! :tada:
# Since it's their birthday, let's give back to these three awesome members of our community by giving thanks and showing our appreciation!
Useful Link: [Big Thread of Birthdays](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/big-thread-of-birthdays/45506)

item.description:
Regardless!
Happy Birthday Burrito! You’re a joy to play FoL / FM with! I’m excited to see how your Neighborhood madness game turns out!

Happy (soon to be) Birthday Orange! One of the best Mafia players on the website! Every game you host is a blast to be in!

Happy (soon to be) Birthday Alfa! Another awesome FoL host! It’s always a ton of fun playing D&D and RP’ing in Dama’s RP with you!
